title: Seaweed
info: Seaweed is a pet-summoning item which summons a Turtle pet that follows the player, like other pets. It lasts indefinitely and does not attack enemies nor take damage, and is purely for aesthetics. Seaweed can rarely be found in the Underground Jungle's Jungle Shrines or Living Mahogany Trees. On the  Desktop version and  Mobile version, it can also be found in Jungle Crates and Bramble Crates.
stat:
